title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water before draining.
Slice planted.chicken into strips and season with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs. Sauté in olive oil until golden, about 5 minutes. Set aside.
In the same pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a gentle simmer. Gradually whisk in freshly grated Parmesan cheese until smooth.
Add the cooked pasta to the sauce and toss to coat evenly, adding pasta water if needed.
Top with the sautéed planted.chicken, garnish with fresh parsley and extra Parmesan, and serve immediately.
